about.title: About Us
about.description: As Dönüşüm Medikal, we have been providing professional solutions for sleep apnea and COPD patients for 20 years. Your health is our priority.
about.storyP1: Founded in 2004, Dönüşüm Medikal started with the mission of providing quality respiratory devices and accessories for sleep apnea and COPD patients.
about.storyP2: With our 20 years of experience, we serve as an authorized dealer of world-renowned brands. We continuously improve ourselves to enhance the quality of life of our customers.
about.storyP3: Our expert team provides customized solutions for each customer, standing by you throughout the entire process from product selection to installation and post-support.

about.freeInstallationDesc: Free device installation and training service in Istanbul and surrounding provinces
